subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Justin Verlander is the only pitcher in baseball history to throw a no-hitter, start a World Series game, and be a rookie of the year and an All-Star in his first two full seasons.
snippet: Justin Verlander is the only pitcher in baseball history to throw a no-hitter, start a World Series game, and be a rookie of the year and an All-Star in his first two full seasons.
